entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Sunday 19 March 2023
